properties.name: file-location
properties.description: Dictates where an uploaded file should be saved.

properties.name: serve-path
properties.description: Describes where an uploaded file will be served.

properties.name: secret
properties.description: The secret used to encrypt JWT tokens.

properties.name: trust.store
properties.description: The location for the SSL trust store.

properties.name: trust.store.password
properties.description: The password for the SSL trust store.

properties.name: eid.discovery-url
properties.description: The url on which EID endpoints can be found.

properties.name: mail.origin
properties.description: The mailadress the mails sent by the server originates from.

properties.name: fronted.proposal.href.format
properties.description: The url people should be pointed towards when sending them to a certain proposal, include '%d' at the location of the id.
